verses.verse: And the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> it from <S%H72>Ebenezer<s%> to <S%H795>Ashdod.<s%>

When the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> they <S%H935>brought<s%> it into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H3322>set<s%> it by <S%H1712>Dagon.<s%>

And when they of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> and <S%H7725>set<s%> him in his <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And when they <S%H7925>arose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> was <S%H5307>fallen<s%> on his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the ark of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H3709>palms<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%> were <S%H3772>cut<s%> off on the <S%H4670>threshold;<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> the stump of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> to him.

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H1712>Dagon's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> in <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

But the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H3513>heavy<s%> on them of <S%H795>Ashdod,<s%> and he <S%H8074>destroyed<s%> them, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> them with <S%H6076>tumors,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> and the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> thereof.

And when the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that it was <S%H3651>so,<s%> they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall not <S%H3427>abide<s%> with us: for his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7185>sore<s%> on us, and on <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> our <S%H430>god.<s%>

They <S%H7971>sent<s%> therefore and <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> to them, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%> And they <S%H559>answered,<s%> Let the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H5437>carried<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> And they <S%H5437>carried<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> thither.

And it was so, that, <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H5437>carried<s%> it <S%H5437>about,<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was against the <S%H5892>city<s%> with a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4103>destruction:<s%> and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great,<s%> and they had <S%H6076>tumors<s%> in their <S%H8368>secret<s%> parts.

Therefore they <S%H7971>sent<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron.<s%> And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> that the <S%H6139>Ekronites<s%> <S%H2199>cried<s%> out, <S%H559>saying,<s%> They have <S%H5437>brought<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to us, to <S%H4191>slay<s%> us and our <S%H5971>people.<s%>

So they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>Send<s%> away the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and let it <S%H7725>go<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> to his own <S%H4725>place,<s%> that it <S%H4191>slay<s%> us not, and our <S%H5971>people:<s%> for there was a <S%H4194>deadly<s%> <S%H4103>destruction<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5892>city;<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%> there.

And the <S%H582>men<s%> that <S%H4191>died<s%> not were <S%H5221>smitten<s%> with the <S%H6076>tumors:<s%> and the <S%H7775>cry<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up to <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
